meanings: be unable to go to the vicinity

vlive.korean: 그 근처에 어디였지? Where was it nearby? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 오랜만에 보이스🙄
회사 근처에 있었잖아 파는 데가! There was a place nearby our company building! 듣기 View video TWICE : 다다다다시시시
vlive.english: There was a place nearby our company building!

vlive.korean: 내가 회사 근처로 갈게 미팅 몇 시에 끝나? I'll go to your firm. When will it be over? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 존잘 연하가 선배 꼬시는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.05
vlive.english: I'll go to your firm. When will it be over?

vlive.korean: [우리 현호] 너네 집 근천데 데리러 갈까? [My Hyunho] I'm in your neighborhood. Shall I come by to pick you up? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 여친의 모든 것이 궁금해 [일진에게 찍혔을 때2] 한스킨 특별편
vlive.english: [My Hyunho] I'm in your neighborhood. Shall I come by to pick you up?

vlive.korean: 옛날 회사 근처에 있었던 김치찌개 집도 나 엄마랑 같이 갔었던... And the kimchi jjigae place near our old office.. I went there with my mom. 듣기 View video TWICE : 모사 8주년🍑🐹
vlive.english: And the kimchi jjigae place near our old office.. I went there with my mom.

examples.korean: We spent the weekend sailing off the south coast. 발음듣기 우리는 남해안 근처에서 요트타기를 하며 주말을 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We spent the weekend sailing off the south coast. 발음

examples.korean: It started to rain so we dived into the nearest cafe. 발음듣기 비가 오기 시작해서 우리는 근처 카페로 급히 뛰어 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It started to rain so we dived into the nearest cafe. 발음

examples.korean: a paved area near the back door 발음듣기 뒷문 근처의 포장된 부분 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a paved area near the back door 발음

examples.korean: Can you drop me near the bank? 발음듣기 은행 근처에 내려 줄 수 있니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can you drop me near the bank? 발음

examples.korean: Is there a stationer’s near here? 발음듣기 이 근처에 문구점이 있나요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Is there a stationer’s near here? 발음
